snippet.title: Death's Door | Official Game Trailer | Netflix
snippet.description:
Become a crow who reaps souls. It's a dead-end job, but when a thief steals your work, you set off on a sword-slashing quest to unearth death's secrets.

Play Death's Door on your mobile devices. Available exclusively on Netflix: https://www.netflix.com/game/81664670

About Netflix:
Netflix is one of the world's leading entertainment services with over 247 million paid memberships in over 190 countries enjoying TV series, films and games across a wide variety of genres and languages. Members can play, pause and resume watching as much as they want, anytime, anywhere, and can change their plans at any time.

Death's Door | Official Game Trailer | Netflix
https://www.youtube.com/@Netflix
